author: Lucy Choisser
comment: I like the refined look and am using it as my daily watch face. I have it 4 stars because the phone (pixle xl) battery reading stays at 100 all day. Edit - booted phone and phone battery function works as developer's quick response explained. Edit - I have to reboot phone each day for phone battery to connect. To bad this doesn't work. Nice face.

reply.author: FabulousWatchFaces
reply.content: Thank you for review! Service, that getting phone battery level starts on phone booting, so reboot will solve problem

title: Clean and attractive

author: Bunlusak Achavanuntakul
comment: Phone batt power is incorrect frequently due to app error.
